description: Step outside and embark on an adventure unlike any other. Our Urban Games combines the thrill of a treasure hunt with the challenge of an escape room and the beauty of a walking tour, all outdoors. We are calling on all adventurers, all seekers of excitement and wonder, to join us on this quest. Fun guaranteed!

reviews.title: Engaging experience
text: The game was engaging and it was nice walking around and seeing places and sights I hadn’t really noticed before. The game wasn’t tough, it was easy to succeed.

reviews.title: Walking tour, fact finding, team-building mission!
text: We had a team meeting in town with colleagues from around the world.  After sitting in meetings all day, we wanted something that got us up and moving, plus progressed us towards our dinner plans.  This activity worked perfectly, and we had a ton of fun along the way.  We played against each other in smaller teams with staggered start times.  We all learned something about the city that we didn't know, got to see some sights that many had not yet seen, and both teams were successful (despite some team-on-team sabotage taking place).  I would definitely recommend this activity as it works well for locals and travelers!  Thanks for the efforts in putting it together.

reviews.title: Panic In The City Adventure Game
text: Great fun. Like combining an escape room and a scavenger hunt. I liked that you weren't under tight time constraints so you could actually enjoy some of the locations.

reviews.title: Good for Tourists
text: Intriguing storyline with good pace, and beautiful sightseeing along the way. We have been to the places many times but never paid attention to such details. Great for tourists or families with active kids. 5 Stars!

reviews.title: BEST RECREATIONAL ACTIVITY IN TORONTO
text: It was by far one of the best recreational experiences in Toronto! I spent my birthday solving mysteries with my friends while learning more about the city. No better way to do it! I highly recommend it and can’t wait to try the other ones as well.

reviews.title: Great Treasure Hunt Walking Tour of Toronto
text: We played as a family and really enjoyed the experience.  The puzzles were fun and a great way to experience our city together.

reviews.title: Fun outdoor exploring game
text: Fun game to play that allows you a chance to explore the city, find some new things and solve riddles along the way.  The riddles were not overly challenging but difficult enough to make you work.

reviews.title: A Fun Way to Explore
text: We had a great time exploring the city while completing Panic in Old Toronto.  The challenges were doable but non-trivial, so we had a sense of accomplishment when we figured each one out.  The route took us to interesting locations that we likely would not have seen if we were left to explore on our own.  It was a great introduction to the city and a fun way to spend the morning.

reviews.title: Great experience!
text: Me and a friend played "the evil dragon of Toronto" game and I would absolutely recommend it. We had a lot of fun walking around and solving the puzzles. We got to see some interesting sights and on top of that I learned some new interesting things about Toronto. Absolutely an amazing experience. Will definitely try the other ones!

reviews.title: An exciting adventure
text: Super fun experience to discover hidden gems of Toronto downtown, whether you are a tourist or a local. Looking forward to trying more and highly recommend!

reviews.title: A Fun Adventure
text: In "The Evil Dragon of Toronto" I felt like a tourist in my own city, and even learned new things too. The messaging platform used throughout the adventure is super easy to use. I enjoyed the variety of puzzles, the visuals provided, and being outdoors the entire time. Looking forward to my next one already!

reviews.title: Fun for everyone!
text: This was so much fun! My friend & I were looking for something to do to kill time. We had an absolute blast!

reviews.title: Great experience
text: Another way to visit and interest a pre-teen!
We had a competition
The puzzles were not easy and required effort.
We saw some very interesting places

reviews.title: Great activity
text: Great activity for visiting the city. The family loved walking the streets of the city and discovering Toronto while having fun!

reviews.title: Excellent!!
text: The game was a lot of fun! I went with family and my daughter said this was her best birthday gift ever!

reviews.title: Good fun!
text: The game was fun and well organized! It was fun to tour around the city and pretend to be a tourist!

reviews.title: Fun in the Esplanade
text: Activate your inner geek and if you haven't got one, ride on the coattails of those who do to solve clues and figure out where to go next. Traipse around an interesting part of Toronto. I've lived in TO my whole life and I forget what hidden delights--parks, fountains, lovely gardens, interesting architecture--are nestled in the Esplanade. Do this with people who share your spirit of fun and you'll have the same hoot I did.

reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
text: This was a ton of fun! My entire family had an amazing time and I'd highly recommend this to anyone looking to get outside and explore their city. We found so many places we never would've even known existed! 10/10 would highly recommend!

reviews.title: 100% recommend
text: Amazing!! Brilliant!! Loved it from start to finish. It was a great way to see the city and have fun at the same time

reviews.title: We had a fantastic time!
text: Enjoying the sunshine, exploring beautiful monuments and streets, even though we couldn't crack the last puzzle, it was loads of fun and a memorable experience. Highly recommended for an adventurous day out!

reviews.title: Great game!
text: It was a refreshing experience being outdoors, solving engaging puzzles, and discovering the city in a unique way. Perfect for couples seeking fun and excitement!

reviews.title: Great escape game in the streets
text: Having experienced their games in Quebec where I had great times. The ones in Toronto were no exception - a complete joy to play! This is a top recommendation for anyone seeking a unique, adventurous experience in the city!

reviews.title: Great outdoor escape game concept
text: Absolutely loved this outdoor escape game concept! Enjoyed being outdoors after the long winter, solving puzzles (not too easy, not too difficult), and experiencing the city in a whole new way. It was a fun time with friends!

reviews.title: Our group had an amazing time!
text: Not only did we have loads of fun, but we also discovered numerous fascinating sights that we would have missed if we had explored the city on our own. We highly recommend this activity to everyone!
